pageText:
| Infinitive | Past simple | Past participle |  |
|---|---|---|---|
| be /bi:, bi/ | was /wɒz, wəz, were /wɜː(r), wə(r)/ | been /biːn/ | là, thì… |
| beat /biːt/ | beat /biːt/ | beaten /ˈbiːtn/ | đánh bại |
| bite /baɪt/ | bit /bɪt/ | bitten /ˈbɪtn/ | cắn |
| born /bɔːn/ | born /bɔːn/ | born /bɔːn/ | sinh ra |
| break /breɪk/ | broke /brəʊk/ | broken /ˈbrəʊkən/ | làm vỡ |
| bring /brɪŋ/ | brought /brɔːt/ | brought /brɔːt/ | mang tới, dẫn theo |
| buy /baɪ/ | bought /bɔːt/ | bought /bɔːt/ | mua |
| choose /tʃuːz/ | chose /tʃəʊz/ | chosen /ˈtʃəʊzn/ | chọn |
| deal /diːl/ | dealt /delt/ | dealt /delt/ | đối phó, giải quyết |
| do /duː/ | did /dɪd/ | done /dʌn/ | làm |
| drive /draɪv/ | drove /drəʊv/ | driven /ˈdrɪvn/ | lái |
| fall /fɔːl/ | fell /fel/ | fallen /ˈfɔːlən/ | rơi xuống |
| feel /fiːl/ | felt /felt/ | felt /felt/ | cảm thấy |
| forget /fəˈɡet/ | forgot /fəˈɡɒt/ | forgotten /fəˈɡɒtn/ | quên |
| get /ɡet/ | got /ɡɒt/ | got /ɡɒt/ | có |
| give /ɡɪv/ | gave /ɡeɪv/ | given /ˈɡɪvn/ | cho |
| grow /ɡrəʊ/ | grew /ɡruː/ | grown /ɡrəʊn/ | trồng, phát triển |
| have /hæv/ | had /hæd/ | had /hæd/ | có |
| hear /hɪə(r)/ | heard /hɜːd/ | heard /hɜːd/ | nghe thấy |
| hold /həʊld/ | held /held/ | held /held/ | cầm, tổ chức, nín (thở) |
| know /nəʊ/ | knew /njuː/ | known /nəʊn/ | biết |
| lend /lend/ | lent /lent/ | lent /lent/ | cho mượn |
| lose /luːz/ | lost /lɒst/ | lost /lɒst/ | đánh mất |
| make /meɪk/ | made /meɪd/ | made /meɪd/ | làm, tạo ra |
| meet /miːt/ | met /met/ | met /met/ | gặp |
| pay /peɪ/ | paid /peɪd/ | paid /peɪd/ | trả |
| put /pʊt/ | put /pʊt/ | put /pʊt/ | đặt, để |
| ride /raɪd/ | rode /rəʊd/ | ridden /ˈrɪdn/ | cưỡi, lái |
| run /rʌn/ | ran /ræn/ | run /rʌn/ | chạy |
| see /siː/ | saw /sɔː/ | seen /siːn/ | thấy, gặp |
| sell /sel/ | sold /səʊld/ | sold /səʊld/ | bán |
| spend /spend/ | spent /spent/ | spent /spent/ | sử dụng (thời gian) |
| steal /stiːl/ | stole /stəʊl/ | stolen /ˈstəʊlən/ | lấy trộm |
| swim /swɪm/ | swam /swæm/ | swum /swʌm/ | bơi |
| throw /θrəʊ/ | threw /θruː/ | thrown /θrəʊn/ | ném |
| wake /weɪk/ | woke /wəʊk/ | woken /ˈwəʊkən/ | thức dậy |
| wear /weə(r)/ | wore /wɔː(r)/ | worn /wɔːn/ | mặc |
| win /wɪn/ | won /wʌn/ | won /wʌn/ | thắng |
